articles.author: Courtney Vinopal
articles.title: Hertz's Tesla purchase paves way for wider adoption of EVs - Quartz
articles.description: The rental car company is purchasing 100,000 Tesla Model 3 vehicles, and seeks to build the largest EV fleet in North America.
articles.content: Teslas valuation hit a record $1 trillion today (Oct. 25) after Hertz announced it will purchase 100,000 electric vehicles from the car company by the end of 2022, giving the manufacturer its biggest… [+4395 chars]

articles.title: Pluto Landmarks Named for Aviation Pioneers Ride and Coleman - NASA
articles.description: More than 60 years after Bessie Coleman broke the bonds of terra firma to become the first African American woman and Native American to earn a pilot’s license, Sally Ride blasted off aboard shuttle Challenger to become the first American woman in space.

articles.title: Despite hybrid release, Dune has a strong box office performance - CBC.ca
articles.description: Denis Villeneuve's Dune debuted with $40.1 million US in ticket sales in its opening weekend in North America, drawing a large number of movie-goers to see the thundering sci-fi epic on the big screen despite it also being available to stream in homes.
articles.content: Denis Villeneuve's Dune debuted with $40.1 million (all figures in US currency) in ticket sales in its opening weekend in North America, drawing a large number of movie-goers to see the thundering sc… [+5032 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Feinberg
articles.title: US citizens will need vaccine or negative test to enter America - The Independent
articles.description: Unvaccinated US citizens and permanent residents will need to provide a negative test within a day of travel to enter the country
articles.content:
US citizens returning from abroad will still need to provide proof of having received a Covid-19 vaccine if they want to avoid more stringent testing requirements, White House officials said.
